CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 7, 1950, pg. 17, reads: "Biggest Crowd in History Sees Homer Brown Take Oath as Judge... - Photos by Smith and Harris"
TitMainTitle: Man wearing three piece suit shaking hands with Wilhelmina Byrd Brown, P. L. Prattis shaking hands with Homer S. Brown, and police officer on right, in courtroom for Brown's investiture ceremony
